subdisciplines.name: Bioorganic Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemistry of living organisms and their biological processes.

subdisciplines.name: Physical Organic Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between the physical and chemical properties of organic molecules.

subdisciplines.name: Organometallic Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemistry of compounds containing carbon-metal bonds.

subdisciplines.name: Polymer Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the synthesis, structure, and properties of polymers.
